step_feedback.feedback: Good job maintaining a straight arm overhead.  Your palm and finger opening and closing were smooth.
You successfully stretched your arm overhead.  Focus on keeping your arm straight and still throughout the exercise.
Try to open your hand wider and make a tighter fist.  The range of motion could be improved.
The fist and hand opening were not fully synchronized with your breathing.  Try coordinating your breathing with the hand movements more precisely.

exercise_summary: You did a good job with the overhead pumping exercise. Remember to keep your arm straight and fully open your hand and make a tight fist.  Focus on coordinating your breathing with the hand movements for better results.  Let's work on improving the range of motion in steps 3 and 4.
